sentences: Vladimir M. Yesipov (Владимир М. Есипов) (fl. 1960s) was a Russian conductor active during the 1960s and 1970s.
He conducted a Tchaikovsky concert in Beijing in 1960.
He was mentioned in Soviet Music (1965) along with Yuri Aranovich for his "creative energy".
Yevstigney Fomin - Orpheus and Eurydice (Орфей и Эвридика) 1967
